captions.text: What up you fucking shitty pussies. Better grab your rifle, shield and helmet, because today is war day.
Group F is the group of war of this Cup. Group F is also F for Fuckers, because the head of the group is...
Guess who?
ARGENTINA
Argentina is Brazil's neighbour who thinks he's a European country in America.
But actually, if Brazil is a third world country, Argentina must be fifth or sixth,
because their currency is worth three times less than ours.
Argentinian idols like Maradona, Evita Perón and Carlos Gardel are ignored around the world.
Nobody knows who they are. The most people know from Argentina is chourizo beef, wine, alfajor and dulce de leche.
In soccer, they are better known for the overuse of violence, dirty play and cocaine.
In fact, Argentina rhymes with cocaina (cocaine).
They've won two Cups, one stolen and the other with a hand goal.
Entonces bamos a los destaques de los boludos argentinos:
This year they have put all their Faith in a Garden gnome, Lionel Messi, who is so smart he fled Argentina at 13.
Kun Agüero, another dwarf striker, who won the English championship with City.
And the Real Madrid midfielder Angel Di Maria.
He plays beautifully. Better, he plays very well, because you can't say a dude with those ugly ears plays beautifully.
And don't tell me about Mascherano, Higuain, Maxi Rodríguez and Lavezzi, because this fuckers don't play shit.
BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA
If Yugoslavia still existed, along with the players of Bosnia, Croatia, Serbia and Montenegro they would have a pretty good team.
But after the 1992 civil war, this blue squad, sorry for the honesty, is a bosshit.
Bosnia is the unique new squad in this Cup. Meaning they're a 22 year old virgin.
They still hoped Ibrahimovic would naturalize, cause his dad is Bosnian,
but Ibra chose to come to Brazil to enjoy the debauchery, on Desimpedido's account.
In fact, in Bosnia, almost everybody's name ends with "vich".
Begovic, Vrsajevic, Misimovic, Salihovic, Hajrovic,
Ibisevic, and also Ogengivic (gingivitis), Conjuntivic (pink eye) and Ovascoévic (Vasco is vice champion).
So let's go to the highlights of the Sarajevo United:
The midfielder from Rome, Pjanit.
And the strikers Ibisevit, from Stuttgart, and Djeco, from Manchester City.
IRAN
This is just another Iranian territory, supported by more than 70 million Muslims.
Iran is the second largest country of the Middle East. Governed by an Ayatollah.
That's why in this Cup this squad is gonna atollah (get stuck).
In Iran, there are no soccer fields, there are minefields.
There are no "peladas" (naked, another name for soccer game), there're only women covered.
There are no fireworks, only grenades. And there is no game, only war.
That's why the Iranian selection is the most feared. I'm talking about the Iranian selection of nuclear weapons.
In soccer, the Iranian players are known for their explosive temper, and by bombing the street.
They're the biggest sniper of the Cup.
Notice that the terrorists, better, the players, are all frowning in the album.
The only one who attempted to smile was cut from the team and stoned in public.
May Allah forgive me, but Iran is so shitty that their highlight is Daniel Davari,
goalkeeper of a team that was relegated from the German championship.
NIGERIA
Nigeria is an eastern African country known as the African giant. Why would that be? Of course it's because of its huge...
Economy and population.
Nigerians are considered to be the most aggressive and rowdy of the Africans.
The country has a lot in common with the Brazilians, especially when we're talking about corruption and criminality.
When it comes to tribes, Nigeria takes the cake.
They have more than 500 tribes there, and in Brazil we only have the black blocs, emos, punks, skinheads, countries, etc.
They even eliminated Brazil in the '96 Olympics, in a turnaround.
Another advantage they have on us is that in Nigeria everyone speaks English.
Joel Santana did not like this.
The highlights of the young squad of the Super Eagles:
The midfielder Moses, the Vagner Love without the colorful braids.
And the brothers "willhavecup":
There will be Cup
There won't be Cup
There will be Cup
There won't be Cup
There will be Cup
There won't be Cup
There will be Cup
There won't be Cup
Yes, there will
No, there won't
Yes, there will
No, there won't
Yes, there will, motherfucker
That's all you nice folks from YouTube, it's time to say goodbye.
Next week we'll be back with Germany, Portugal, Ghana and USA.
SUBSCRIBE

title: ÁLBUM DA COPA DO DESIMPEDIDOS - #06 GRUPO F
